de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Class AbstractImConnectionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection.AbstractImConnectionContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed, ImConnectionContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultImcConnectionContext, DefaultImvConnectionContext

    public abstract class AbstractImConnectionContext
extends Object
implements ImConnectionContext
    Generic base for an IM(C/V) connection context.
